casebody.data:
ELWAY CO. v. PETTIT et al. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. May 16, 1913.) Appeal from Special Term, Kings County. Action by the Elway Company against Louie R. Pettit and another. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendants appeal. Affirmed.

Argued before JENKS, P. J., and HIRSCHBERG, BURR, THOMAS, and STAPLETON, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, on the authority of Shelly v. City of New York, 141 N. Y. Supp. 955, decided herewith.

HIRSCHBERG, J., not voting.
